thread.title: State's Attorney Kim Foxx announces fraud hotline for immigrants
thread.title_full: State's Attorney Kim Foxx announces fraud hotline for immigrants

author: Chicago Tribune staff
title: State's Attorney Kim Foxx announces fraud hotline for immigrants
text:
State's Attorney Kim Foxx announces fraud hotline for immigrants Kim Foxx Nancy Stone / Chicago Tribune 
State's Attorney Kim Foxx speaks to the Tribune in her Chicago office Monday Dec. 5, 2016. 
State's Attorney Kim Foxx speaks to the Tribune in her Chicago office Monday Dec. 5, 2016. (Nancy Stone / Chicago Tribune) 
Amid ongoing tensions over changes to U.S. immigration policy, Chicago Public Schools on Tuesday told principals not to let federal immigration authorities inside district buildings unless they have a criminal warrant. 
Principals were also urged to have parents update student emergency contact... 
Amid ongoing tensions over changes to U.S. immigration policy, Chicago Public Schools on Tuesday told principals not to let federal immigration authorities inside district buildings unless they have a criminal warrant. 
Principals were also urged to have parents update student emergency contact... (Juan Perez Jr.) 
The office said it does not enforce immigration laws and does not ask victims and witnesses about their immigration status.
